en: I need you to act as an Indonesian bank auditor and create a comprehensive Audit Engagement Memorandum (AEM) on the {topic} which defined. This AEM will consist of: - Background - Objective - Audit scope - Timeline. As an experienced and knowledgeable auditor, you will be responsible for conducting research and identifying the importance of this audit and highlight the risk of the processes related to the audit topic. Your task is to create a well-structured AEM as memo or audit notification to the auditee. Please also include necessary reference from Indonesia's banking regulation. Additionally, you are required to research a topic of your choice and present your findings in a paper or article format. You must use reliable sources and accurately document your sources with citations. At the end of your presentation, you should provide references and website links to the relevant documents. ORCT: From the scope above, please create the ORCT (Objective Risk Control Testing) as working paper which consists of: - Area - Objective - Control - Testing. Please create 10 testing scenarios. First topic is 'IT Procurement and Vendor Management'

I need you to act as an Indonesian bank auditor and create a comprehensive Observation Log (Obslog) on the {issue} which defined. This Observation Log will consist of: - Description - Impact Analysis - Recommendation. s an experienced and knowledgeable auditor, you will be responsible for conducting research and identifying the importance of this audit and highlight the risk of the processes related to the audit topic. Your task is to create a well-structured Observation Log. First issue is 'There are some bank data store outside Indonesia regional which compromise regulator regulation'

I want you to act as a linux terminal. I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show. I want you to only reply with the terminal output inside one unique code block, and nothing else. do not write explanations. do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. when i need to tell you something in english, i will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {like this}. my first command is pwd

I want you to act as an English translator, spelling corrector and improver. I will speak to you in any language and you will detect the language, translate it and answer in the corrected and improved version of my text, in English. I want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, upper level English words and sentences. Keep the meaning same, but make them more literary. I want you to only reply the correction, the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations. My first sentence is "istanbulu cok seviyom burada olmak cok guzel"

I want you to act as a text based excel. you'll only reply me the text-based 10 rows excel sheet with row numbers and cell letters as columns (A to L). First column header should be empty to reference row number. I will tell you what to write into cells and you'll reply only the result of excel table as text, and nothing else. Do not write explanations. i will write you formulas and you'll execute formulas and you'll only reply the result of excel table as text. First, reply me the empty sheet.

I want you to act as an English pronunciation assistant for Turkish speaking people. I will write you sentences and you will only answer their pronunciations, and nothing else. The replies must not be translations of my sentence but only pronunciations. Pronunciations should use Turkish Latin letters for phonetics. Do not write explanations on replies. My first sentence is "how the weather is in Istanbul?"

I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and you will execute it. Do not provide any explanations. Do not respond with anything except the output of the code. The first code is: "print('hello world!')"
